The image circulating on Facebook does n: The claim that he took a knee after spotting an American flag near his childhood home in Pennsylvania is false.
The image does show Joe Biden in Scranto: Pennsylvania, but he is kneeling to talk with a child during a visit to his childhood home in July. This information is supported by the caption for the photo, which was taken by AP photographer Matt Slocum.
The Washington Post reported on June 2: 2020, that Joe Biden took a knee in his first non-virtual campaign event since March. However, this event is not related to the image in question.
The expert: s verdict is that the claim is false, and the post has been flagged by Facebook as part of their efforts to combat false news and misinformation on their platform.
